analysis

Interface IWeightedAnalysis

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IMultilingual
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WeightsTable

    public interface IWeightedAnalysis
extends IMultilingual
    This interface defines several classes, responsible for setting weights to terms within the document and / or within the document corpus
    Author:
    Pdz

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IAnalysisResult calculateTFIDF(IWeightedAnalysis corpusData)
      Uses previously calculated TF and IDF to produce TF-IDF from them
      IAnalysisResult filter(IWeightsFilter filter)
      Filters out weights based on the IWeightsFilter object
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,? extends java.lang.Number> getWeights(Languages lang)
      Gets weights data for a specified language

      • Methods inherited from interface analysis.IMultilingual

        getLanguages

    • Method Detail

      • filter

        IAnalysisResult filter(IWeightsFilter filter)
        Filters out weights based on the IWeightsFilter object
        Parameters:
        filter - Filter to use when filtering out "unneeded" weights
        Returns:
        Results of filtering

      • calculateTFIDF

        IAnalysisResult calculateTFIDF(IWeightedAnalysis corpusData)

        Returns:

        Returns:
